article_body:
Thank you for viewing our Cockpit Panel.

Check back here frequently for the latest news and updates on all things apps and panels, we push to bring you the latest updates and make sure our panels work with each revision of the supported applications.

We have the following Cockpit Panels Avaiable now: Cinema, IBO Pro, iMPlayer, IPVanish, FCD, LTQ2, LTQ Deluxe, MBMSoft App Store, Multi DNS Proxy (Hardcoded Apk's), NexTV, PIA VPN, Purple, Smarters v3, Smarters v3 OVPN, SmartCinema, Smarters v4, SmartCinema v4, SparkleTV, SVS AppStore, Tivimate, & XC Lic v3 & Lic v4
